attributes.action: beseech and entreat the ECB to: give grass roots cricketers a voice; and recall Lord MacLaurin as Chairman for two years.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The England & Wales Cricket Board ECB) is in disarray. Many professional and grass roots cricketers have lost confidence in the ECB because of recent happenings including the debacles with the Stanford arrangements and with the coach and captain of OUR national team. Lord MacLaurin has the skils, stature and experience to oversee the turnaround of OUR cricket.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
